Key Match Events: Sri Lanka won by 5 wickets (with 10 balls remaining)
Sadeera Samarawickrama says that the wicket was gripping and turning
Miscellaneous Highlights: Netherlands started well with the early wickets of Kusal Perera and Kusal Mendis thanks to Aryan Dutt

Despite the historic seventh-wicket stand between Sybrand Engelbrecht and Logan van Beek, and Aryan Dutt's heroic efforts with the ball, Sri Lanka look in cruise control on a fairly batting-friendly pitch
Others: Netherlands' 262 today is their highest total against Sri Lanka, going past the 258 way back in 2006
Both Dilshan Madushanka and Kasun Rajitha registered career-best figures as they picked four wickets apiece
